skill.name: goal-tracker
skill.description: Track goal progress, derive state from execution, identify gaps, trigger actions. Use for goal status checks, progress reviews, and operational goal management.
skill.summary: Track goal progress, derive state from execution, identify gaps, trigger actions. Use for goal statu...
skill.author: BellaBe

security_audit.summary: Pure markdown documentation file describing a goal tracking methodology. No executable code present. The skill operates as a behavioral guide for AI assistants, defining how to read goal files and thread states to compute progress metrics. All described operations are benign file read/write actions within a structured documentation system.

content.value_statement: Manual goal tracking is time-consuming and prone to outdated information. This skill derives goal state from execution threads and calculates progress metrics automatically. It identifies gaps, projects trajectory, and recommends actions to keep goals on track.
actual_capabilities: Derive goal state from execution threads and success criteria
Calculate progress metrics against targets with gap analysis
Project trajectory and assess on-track or at-risk status
Generate recommendations or auto-create threads to close gaps
Update goal files with metrics, trajectory, and execution logs
Integrate with goal-setter and reasoning threads for workflow
limitations: Operates only on goals structured as markdown files in strategy/goals/
Requires threads to be linked to subgoals for state derivation
No external tool integrations or real-time notifications
Does not modify goal objectives or success criteria

use_cases.title: Weekly Progress Reviews
use_cases.description: Get automated status reports on all active goals with gap analysis and recommended actions for the week ahead.

use_cases.title: Business Objective Tracking
use_cases.description: Track MRR, customer acquisition, and pipeline goals with trajectory projections and early risk alerts.

use_cases.title: Learning Progress Monitoring
use_cases.description: Monitor skill development goals by deriving completion metrics from study threads and content consumption.

prompt_templates.title: Quick Status Check
prompt_templates.prompt: How am I doing on my goal to {goal-name}?

prompt_templates.title: Full Progress Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a complete progress report for my {goal-name} goal including metrics, trajectory, and recommended actions.

prompt_templates.title: Gap Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: What gaps exist in my {goal-name} goal and what actions would close them?

prompt_templates.title: Goal Completion Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Is my {goal-name} goal complete? Verify all success criteria and update the goal state.

output_examples.input: How am I doing on my Q1 customer acquisition goal?
output: Goal: Q1 Customer Acquisition - Status: At Risk
Metrics: New customers (6/10), Pipeline (12/20), Conversion rate (15%/25%)
Trajectory: Currently behind pace, projected to miss deadline by 10 days
Gaps: Pipeline gap of 8 opportunities, conversion rate 10% below target
Recommended Actions: (1) Launch outbound campaign, (2) A/B test landing page, (3) Add referral incentive

best_practices: Structure goals with clear success criteria and linked threads before using the tracker
Run weekly progress reviews to catch trajectory issues early
Use autonomy mode settings to control when actions are auto-created vs. user-approved
anti_patterns: Creating goals without defined success criteria or linked threads
Ignoring trajectory warnings until deadline approaches
Using goal-tracker without goal-setter to establish proper goal structure

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It is designed for AI assistants that can read and write markdown files.

faq.question: How often should I update goal state?
faq.answer: Run state derivation on-demand for instant reports. Calculate trajectory weekly minimum. Do full reviews before planning sessions.

faq.question: Can it integrate with external tools?
faq.answer: No. This skill operates only on local markdown files. It does not connect to external APIs, project management tools, or databases.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill only reads and writes files you specify. No data is sent externally. All processing happens locally through the AI assistant.

faq.question: Why is my goal showing no progress?
faq.answer: Check that threads are linked to subgoals via meta.json. The tracker derives state from thread completion, not manual updates. Goals without linked threads show as pending.

faq.question: How is this different from other task managers?
faq.answer: This skill derives state automatically from execution rather than requiring manual status updates. It computes progress from actual thread outcomes and learning stages.
